name: Justin Heubrock
text: Could improve on cleaning.  Pizza came out fresh for the buffet. I liked the selection but it would have been an issue if I had kids with me.

name: Natalie
text: Expensive! But I loved the food! I ordered a meat lover pizza, pasta, boneless wings and 4 drinks for delivery.... $50! On a different day I ordered 2 medium 1 topping pizzas, 2 orders of wings, pasta, garlic knots....$30! Twice the food for almost half the price! Lesson learned! Order off the $5 menu!

name: Heidi Fenenga
text: The food tasted good, but the service needs improvement. We ordered bread sticks and two pizzas. We never got the bread sticks, even after we reminded the waitress when she brought the pizzas. They tried to charge us for them, I told them ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristen A
text: I also a month ago had a similar thing happen. I tried ordering a pizza there. 40 minutes later the lady called me back saying she didn‚Äôt know where the delivery driver is. She asked me to come get the pizza but I had no means of transportation. After reading other comments I feel like Jesus was looking out for me that day.

name: Dennis Stanish ll
text: Food is good, the service is better and the price is about average.

name: Luke K
text: Placed an order for delivery and the girl said it would be 45 minutes. Got a call a half hour later saying they don‚Äôt have a delivery driver. After reading some other reviews, lying about delivery service seems to be a common practice at ‚Ä¶More

name: Kenny Scott
text: All tables were dirty. Cleaned as people came in. Food ordering was slow. Others got food ordered before we did. One waitess for entire dining room. Food was good though.  Check was wrong. Good if they hired more staff I suppose.

text: It's a really good place to take my kids to an I an I raised on that place they fed me a lot of my meals

text: Alot of flys ordered 18 wings got 15.  The guy that was making pizza touched many different surfaces and used no gloves.  This place absolutely sucks...

text: The food was amazing and all the food was hot and fresh and the service was top notch

name: Amber Glynn
text: What a rat hole. The pizza was actually pretty good, but the restaurant was really dirty and it was AWFUL customer service - the employees were seriously so horrible that it was borderline amusing. I can't imagine this place passing a health code inspection.

name: Brandon Ashford
text: Friendly staff, ok selection on the buffet. I'd like to add that I've been to quite a few Pizza Hut buffets and this is the only one that puts icing on their cinnamon bread. A+

name: Nick Koch
text: Pizza was fine.  However, we asked for red peppers and parmesan cheese and were sent away with parmesan and a bunch of hand wipes (which we discovered upon arriving back home).  I returned to the restaurant to pick up peppers and explained ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Janke
text: Poor service.  Unable to deliver and does not call when they take an order and yet cannot follow through. Restaurant looks sloppy.
